content.title: Grammar
table: I wish she'd write a letter

content.title: Conversation
table: A: I wanna go to the airport. Can you tell me how to get there?
الف: من می‌خواهم به فرودگاه بروم. ممکنه به من بگویید چطور می‌توانم آنجا بروم؟
B: I'm sorry, but I don't know.
A: I think I can take the subway. Do you know where the subway is?
الف: من فکر می‌کنم با مترو می‌توانم بروم. شما می‌دانید مترو کجاست؟

content.title: Conversation
table: Shima: How long does it take to take us to the airport?
شیما: چقدر طول می‌کشد ما را به فرودگاه ببرید؟
Taxi driver: It's only ten minutes.
Shima: How much is the fare?

content.title: Common Phrases
table: Where is the nearest subway station?
Can I buy a monthly pass?
می‌توانم یک بلید بک ماهه بخرم؟
Please tell me where to get off.
لطفاً به من بگویید کجا پیاده شوم.

content.title: Reading
content.description: Tehran has five subway lines. Four lines travel within the city and one line travels outside of the city. Tehrans metro transports more than three million passengers every day. In the past the people of Tehran used buses, minibuses, taxis, motorcycles and personal cars for transportation.
